sen.j: 初め比叡山に登り天台教学を修学したが、その後浄土宗の僧良忠に師事して浄土教学を修めて仁和寺西谷法光明院に住した。
sen.e: He entered Hieizan mountain and learnt the doctrine of Tendai sect at first, however, he learnt from a priest of Jodo sect, Ryochu and learnt the doctrine of Jodo sect and resided at Nishitani-hokomyo-in temple in the premises of Ninna-ji Temple.
sen.cmt: データベースの用語では「仁和寺西谷法光明院」の詠み方が不詳となっています。仮に左記の様にしています。
sen.e: He entered Hieizan mountain and initially learnt the doctrine of the Tendai sect; however, he learnt from a priest of the Jodo sect, Ryochu, and learnt the doctrine of the Jodo sect and resided at Nishitani-hokomyo-in temple on the premises of Ninna-ji Temple.

He entered Hieizan Mt. Hiei and initially learnt the doctrine of the Tendai sect; however, he learnt from a priest of the Jodo sect, Ryochu, and learnt the doctrine of the Jodo sect and resided at Nishitani-hokomyo-in temple on the premises of Ninna-ji Temple.

sen.j: 一方、京都一条の清浄華院第4世の住持となり、浄土宗の布教に力を尽くし、然空の法流は一条流（西谷流）と称されるようになった。
sen.e: Meanwhile, he became the 4th chief priest of Shojoke-in Temple at Ichijo, Kyoto and made efforts in missionary work of Jodo sect, and his doctrine was called as Ichijo-ryu (Nishitani school.)
